instNote: ﻿this Institution, raised by the Holy See to the rank of a Catholic University, has the power of conferring degrees in the different departments of the Sciences, upon such of the Students, and members of the Reverend Clergy, as qualify themselves to receive them by Competent Examinations. The Programme of Examination for the degrees in the faculty of Theology may be obtained from the Very Rev. Superior of the Seminary, President of St. Mary's University.
